properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:09PM EST until February 7 at 6:12PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North
Carolina...

Yadkin River At Elkin affecting Surry and Yadkin Counties

...Two to locally three and a half inches of rain have fallen
across the Yadkin River basin since midnight. Runoff from this
rainfall continues to accumulate in the Yadkin River, and will
result in minor flooding of the river in the community of Elkin...

The Flood Warning continues for
the Yadkin River At Elkin.
* until Friday evening.
* at 8:00 PM Thursday the stage was 20.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* The Yadkin River will continue rising to near 20.6 feet by after
midnight Friday. The river will fall below flood stage by around
sunrise Friday morning.
* Impact...at 18.5 feet...Rockford Road near Rockford floods.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 21.0
feet on Oct 11 2018.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.
